userreviews.userReview: This is a very intimate description of what it is like to deal with cancer from both the personal and the peripheral viewpoints.

description: Written for cancer patients, their caregivers, and friends, this book is designed to help you cope with the emotional stress of cancer and make sense of your life. There is a guide to resources for cancer education, treatments, and hospice services in Canada and the United States included.
title: Cancer Can't Destroy Love
